text: An extravaganza is a type of literary and musical work. It may also refer to: Extravaganza may also refer to: * Extravaganza (TV series), an Indonesian comedy and variety show * Extravaganza (album), by British rock group Stackridge * "Extravaganza" (song), by R&B; singer Jamie Foxx * Extravaganza (music festival), an event held annually at the University of California, Santa Barbara
title: Extravaganza (disambiguation)
